titles.title: Genomic Research and Accessibility Act
To amend title 35, United States Code, to prohibit the patenting of human genetic material.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 2/12/2007 E315-316)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

bill.summary:
2/9/2007--Introduced.
Genomic Research and Accessibility Act - Prohibits patents from being obtained for a nucleotide sequence, or its functions or correlations, or the naturally occurring products it specifies.
